articles.author: Alexandra Deabler
articles.title: Food labels that include exercise advice could help battle obesity, researchers claim
articles.description: You might think twice about what you eat.
articles.content:
You might think twice about what you eat.
U.K. researchers claim that a new food labeling system that would show how much exercise would be needed to burn off the food’s calories could help battle obesity. However, critics are claiming it could promote eatin… [+2996 chars]

articles.author: Greg Norman
articles.title: Barnard College students 'apprehensive,' 'shaken up' after freshman, 18, stabbed to death nearby
articles.description: Students at New York City’s Barnard College tell Fox News they are “apprehensive” and the community is “pretty shaken up” Thursday after an 18-year-old freshman was stabbed to death last night inside a nearby park.
articles.content:
NEW YORK CITY -- Students at New York City’s Barnard College told Fox News they are “apprehensive” and the community is “pretty shaken up” Thursday after an 18-year-old freshman was stabbed to death Wednesday night at a nearby park.
Tessa Majors, a Barnard s… [+5003 chars]

articles.author: Michael Hollan
articles.title: Tapping shaken beer cans won't prevent them from exploding
articles.description: Yet another urban myth bites the dust.
articles.content:
Yet another urban myth bites the dust.
There’s nothing worse than grabbing a fresh can of beer only to have it explode in your face. Well, it turns out, it’s even harder to avoid that situation than previously thought.

articles.title: Singer Huey Lewis admits he considered suicide after hearing loss diagnosis: It 'ruined everything'
articles.description: Singer Huey Lewis is opening up about struggling with his hearing loss diagnosis.
articles.content:
Singer Huey Lewis is opening up about struggling with his hearing loss diagnosis.

articles.title: Rashida Tlaib deletes tweet blaming 'white supremacy' for Jersey City shooting
articles.description: Rep. Rashida Tlaib, D-Mich., received a flurry of attention on Thursday after she tweeted that "white supremacy" was behind the Jersey City shooting that left multiple people dead.
articles.content:
Rep. Rashida Tlaib, D-Mich., received a flurry of attention on Thursday after she tweeted that "white supremacy" was behind the Jersey City shooting that left multiple people dead.

articles.author: Bradford Betz
articles.title: Chicago prosecutor who dropped charges against Jussie Smollett expunges more than 1,000 marijuana convictions
articles.description: Kim Foxx, the Cook County state attorney who dismissed charges against Jussie Smollett earlier this year, filed motions Wednesday to expunge more than 1,000 marijuana convictions, a move that paves the way for clearing tens of thousands of convictions.
